column4: what package do i need to install in ubuntu so i can ftp into my box ?
Here's a kind of old page giving some options: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/FtpServer
Actually, sorry, I just read the page I linked you to and it's terribly written.
Here's one for Maverick with vsftpd: http://www.jonathanmoeller.com/screed/?p=2127 but I strongly urge you to look into SFTP instead.
